Welcome to this Paper Chase,

This application will guide you to all important World Cultural Heritage sights in Bamberg. Once you arrive at the first waypoint you have to solve a riddle to unlock the next waypoint. Please mind the traffic rules and the suggested bus routes.

You will receive important information and tips about the sight at every waypoint.

Have fun solving the riddles and discovering Bamberg.
Yours sincerely project workshop "Schnitzeljagd World-Heritage" 2015/2016 of the Academic High School Clavius - Bamberg
